Only download attachments when manually requested
Do you want to add notes

Notes App is a good helper to manage your schedules and notes. Write down whats on your mind and get reminder everyday. 

Key features : 

- Add notes quickly with some description and it can be edited be later. 

- Get reminders notification everyday which has date near to present date. 

- Add sticky note widget to your home, easy to open. 

- Add priority to notes which helps reminder to show important note.


Implementation :



Room Database 

It holds all the notes which is basically stores data in SQLite database in tables of rows and columns. Each row represents one entity (or record), and each column represents a value in that entity. While creating database it populates data from json file.



Recycler View 

It shows list of notes. It display two column list if the device is a tablet or single column for mobile. It shows data from room database with paging of data and the key component is the PagedList class.



Paging Library 

The Paging Library helps to load and display small chunks of data at a time. Loading partial data on demand reduces usage of system resources. Which loads chunks of your app's data, or pages. As more data is needed, it's paged into the existing PagedList object.



ViewModel 

ViewModel is helper class for the UI controller that is responsible for preparing data for the UI. Data is automatically retained during configuration changes so that data they hold is immediately available to the next activity or fragment instance. Creates ViewModel instance with ViewModelProvider, which will create ViewModels via the custom Factory and retain them in the given store.



Navigation Drawer 

Provides option to move between the screens.



Content Provider 

It presents data to external applications. Access notes data by content uri content://com.shashankbhat.notesapp/note_table to get all notes data.



Widget 

Add widget to home screen that shows a note and easy to open



Alarm Manager 

It helps basically in scheduling the work. Fires the broadcast message whenever time ticks 12:00 AM and notifies with a note.



Broadcast Receiver 

It does background work when it receives broadcast message from AlarmManager. Broadcast receiver initializes a Worker and that sends notification.



Custom view component 

Priority of each notes is shown with custom component.
